content.question: The work done on an object as a function of time is given by the graph shown. Which of the following statements is correct about the power delivered during the first two seconds?

choices.label: The power delivered is always positive.
The power delivered is always negative.
The power is positive, then zero then negative.

content.answer: The power is positive, then zero then negative.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
